explains: n. 初级读本；识字课本；原始物
wordGroup: epoxy primer n. 环氧底漆
shop primer 预涂底漆；临时防锈底漆
primer coating 涂底剂；初级涂烘

sentences.en: The bare metal was sprayed with several coats of primer.
sentences.cn: 裸露的金属被喷了几层底漆。

sentences.en: The President doesn't need a primer on national security.
sentences.cn: 总统对于国家安全是不需要读入门书的。

sentences.en: A quick controller and view primer.
sentences.cn: 控制器和视图快速入门。
